pages.text: The Cold Snap Brawler was built to defend a large village. One day, a baby villager gave the Brawler their boxing gloves. Hours later, a player stormed into the village with a raiding party on their heels. No villager survived this day, but the Brawler was spared, now refusing to rest until they avenge their village.

pages.title: Nether Brawler
pages.text: A Brawler, melted from the heat of the Nether. No one knows how or why a horde of snowmen decided going to the Nether would be a good idea, but those that have leave behind a trail of slush when they move.

pages.title: End Brawler
pages.text: A Brawler, mutated by the desolate environments of the end. Has a chance to teleport you or itself when attacking or attacked

pages.title: Plague Brawler
pages.text: A Brawler filled with the murky waters of the swamp. May transmit parasites and diseases, or generally make you feel unwell
